item.title: Jobs
item.description: Jobs Boards IRIS Job Announcements EarthWorks Jobs Seismological Society of America Jobs Geological Society of America Geoscience Job Board USGS Mendenhall Research Fellowship Program Japan Society for the Promotion of Science Postdoctoral Fellowships AGU PathFinder CIG Jobs Email listing Earth Sciences Job Email list University/Institution Jobs Carnegie Institution for Science Jobs Listing Lamont-Doherty Earth Observatory of Columbia University Postdoctoral Fellowship University of Texas Institute for Geophysics Job Listings Caltech Academic Positions and Opportunities Scripps Institution of Oceanography, UC San Diego Jobs Wallenberg-NTU Presidential Postdoctoral Fellowship Other Job blogs Websites for Earth Scientists on the academic job hunt Revision history 2019-12-25: update some drafts, commit to seisman 2019-11-10: initial draft, reference to Seisman’s links
